title: How do you guys download video games?
content:
I think internet here in pes rr campus is slow af. Jio dosent work(too slow) and airtel is giving me 40 Mbps(~5 MBPS) in boys hostel

Is there any way i can find a good internet connection to download games and play online games

comments.body: Whats the improvent u r seeing?
Internet is also faster.....like if we get 50mbps normally.....then we will get 100mbps with cloudflare
F block wifi works just get your laptop there download it i downloaded a couple of games
